name: MR. GREEK Bottled Salad Dressing (80 Cals per 15ml serving)
description: Bring home our long-awaited Signature Greek salad dressing and dress your salad right! Fresh, healthy and naturally Mediterranean.

name: MR. GREEK Fried Kalamari (260-300 Cals/serving; serves 4)
description: Dusted in seasoned flour and lightly fried. One taste and you'll know why we're Canada's favourite kalamari. Served with a choice of grilled pita or garlic bread.

name: MR. GREEK Grilled Kalamari (190-230 Cals/serving; serves 4)
description: Served with freshly sautéed peppers and onions. Generously drizzled with extra virgin olive oil and served with a fresh, juicy, grilled lemon. Served with a choice of grilled pita or garlic bread.

name: Chicken Souvlaki Stick (170 Cals)
description: Fire-grilled chicken souvlaki stick served traditionally with fresh Vienna bread and tzatziki.

name: Pork Souvlaki Stick (290 Cals)
description: Fire-grilled pork souvlaki stick served traditionally with fresh Vienna bread and tzatziki.

name: Spanakopita Appetizer (410 Cals /serving; serves 2)
description: A delicious, freshly baked spinach pie with onions, leeks, herbs, feta & mizithra cheese cooked in delicate phyllo pastry.

name: Spanakopita & Salad (1130 Cals)
description: A delicious, freshly baked spinach pie with herbs and feta cooked in a delicate phyllo pastry. Served with a side Signature Greek salad.

name: Tiropita Appetizer (370 Cals /serving; serves 2)
description: A scrumptious, savoury phyllo pastry pie oozing with feta & mizithra cheese filling.

name: Tiropita & Salad (1040 Cals)
description: A delicious freshly baked pastry pie with feta cheese filling. Served with a side Signature Greek salad.

name: Mediterranean Spinach & Cheese Dip (130 Cals /serving; serves 4)
description: A fresh creamy blend of spinach, grilled artichokes and roasted red pepper, melted together with cheddar, cream and Romano cheeses. Served hot with a grilled pita.

name: Dips Trio (210 Cals /serving; serves 6)
description: A shareable platter of tzatziki, hummus & tirokafteri. Also available individually. Served with a grilled pita.

name: Tzatziki Appetizer (100 Cals /serving; serves 4)
description: An authentic recipe of pressed yogurt mixed with zesty fresh garlic and cucumber. Served with a grilled pita.

name: Hummus Appetizer (100 Cals /serving; serves 4)
description: A purée of freshly prepared garbanzo beans and tahini enhanced with a hint of garlic, fresh lemon juice and extra virgin olive oil. Served with a grilled pita.

name: Tirokafteri (Spicy Feta) Appetizer (110 Cals/ serving; serves 4)
description: A mildly spicy crumbled feta spread with fresh roasted peppers, caramelized onions and roasted garlic with a hint of hot cherry peppers. Served with a grilled pita.

name: Signature Greek Salad (770-910 Cals)
description: Iceberg and romaine lettuce mixed with red cabbage, carrots, red onion and MR. GREEK dressing. Topped with Kalamata olives, cucumber, tomato, fresh oregano and feta. Served with a choice of grilled pita or garlic bread.

name: Chicken Greek Salad (940-1080 Cals)
description: Marinated fire-grilled chicken filet served over Signature Greek Salad. Served with a choice of grilled pita or garlic bread.

name: Village Salad (750-890 Cals)
description: Capture the colour of the Mediterranean with fresh hot house tomato, cucumber, green pepper, red onion, feta, Kalamata olives, extra virgin olive oil and fresh parsley. Served with a choice of grilled pita or garlic bread.

name: Chicken Village Salad (920-1080 Cals)
description: Marinated fire-grilled chicken filet over our Village Salad. Served with a choice of grilled pita or garlic bread.

name: Ikaria Salad (1100-1330 Cals)
description: A wholesome chickepea salad. Tossed with red and yellow peppers, cucumbers, shredded parsley, red onions, feta and dried cranberries on a bed of arugula. Dressed with olive oil, fresh lemon and local Ontario honey. Served with grilled pita or garlic bread.

name: Fakés (Lentil) Soup (510 Cals)
description: A hearty & popular soup with just the right amount of fresh herbs & spices.

name: Fasolada (Navy Bean) Soup (210 Cals)
description: A traditional Greek soup made with navy beans & vegetables.

name: Soup & Salad (520-820 Cals)
description: Your choice of fasolada (navy bean) soup or lentil soup and a side Greek salad.

name: Pork Souvlaki Pita (580-680 Cals)
description: Two fire-grilled pork sticks wrapped with tzatziki, red onion and tomato.

name: Chicken Souvlaki Pita (440-540 Cals)
description: Two fire-grilled chicken sticks wrapped with tzatziki, red onion and tomato.

name: Traditional Gyro Pita (680-780 Cals)
description: Seasoned and thinly sliced rotisserie roasted lamb and beef, wrapped with tzatziki, red onion & tomato.

name: Chicken Gyro Pita (280-380 Cals)
description: Seasoned and thinly sliced rotisserie roasted chicken gyro, wrapped with tzatziki, red onion & tomato.

name: Veggie Pita (280-580 Cals)
description: Cucumbers, lettuce, tomatoes, feta, green peppers, red onion and tzatziki.

name: Falafel Pita (490-590 Cals)
description: Crispy vegetarian fritters made from ground chickpeas mixed with herbs & spices; with hummus, red onions, green peppers, tomatoes & feta.

name: Ikaria Salad Wrap (840 Cals)
description: A high protein wrap filled with Ikaria chickpea salad, arugula, rice and tirokafteri (spicy feta).

name: Chicken Greek Wrap (780 Cals)
description: Marinated fire-grilled chicken filet, tzatziki and Signature Greek Salad wrapped in a spinach garlic pesto tortilla.

name: The Classic Burger (700 Cals)
description: Tomato, lettuce & red onion.

name: The Hercules Burger (830 Cals)
description: Mushrooms, lettuce, tzatziki & feta.

name: Spartan Burger (800 Cals)
description: Tirokafteri (spicy feta), lettuce, tomato & caramelized onions.

name: Classic Chicken Souvlaki (830-940 Cals)
description: Tender souvlaki chunks of chicken, specially marinated and fire-grilled. Served with your choice of two sides, Signature Greek salad, grilled pita or garlic bread, & tzatziki.

name: Classic Pork Souvlaki (880-1020 Cals)
description: Tender souvlaki chunks of pork, specially marinated and fire-grilled. Served with your choice of two sides, Signature Greek salad, grilled pita or garlic bread, & tzatziki.

name: Classic Lamb Souvlaki (890-1030 Cals)
description: Tender souvlaki chunks of lamb, specially marinated and grilled to your liking. Served with your choice of two sides, Signature Greek salad, grilled pita or garlic bread, & tzatziki.

name: Beef Tenderloin Souvlaki (950-1290 Cals)
description: Hand-cut premium beef tenderloin, red onion, green & red peppers. Grilled to your liking. Served with your choice of two sides, Signature Greek salad, grilled pita or garlic bread, & tzatziki.

name: Classic Traditional Gyro (1410-1520 Cals)
description: Seasoned lamb and beef, rotisserie roasted and thinly sliced. Served with your choice of two sides, Signature Greek salad, grilled pita or garlic bread, & tzatziki.

name: Classic Chicken Gyro (1250-1390 Cals)
description: Seasoned chicken, rotisserie roasted and thinly sliced. Served with your choice of two sides, Signature Greek salad, grilled pita or garlic bread, & tzatziki.

name: Original Pork Souvlaki (950-1080 Cals)
description: Three fire-grilled pork souvlaki sticks. Served with your choice of one side, Signature Greek salad, grilled pita or garlic bread & tzatziki.

name: Original Chicken Souvlaki (750-880 Cals)
description: Two fire-grilled chicken souvlaki sticks. Served with your choice of one side, Signature Greek salad, grilled pita or garlic bread & tzatziki.

name: Original Traditional Gyro (1210-1350 Cals)
description: Seasoned lamb and beef, rotisserie roasted and thinly sliced. Served with your choice of one side, Signature Greek salad, grilled pita or garlic bread & tzatziki.

name: Original Chicken Gyro (1120-1260 Cals)
description: Rotisserie roasted seasoned chicken, thinly sliced. Served with your choice of one side, Signature Greek salad, grilled pita or garlic bread & tzatziki.

name: Vegetable Souvlaki (860-990 Cals)
description: Fresh grilled eggplant, zucchini, mushrooms, peppers and red onions on a skewer with two fresh tomatoes topped with feta and baked. Served with rice, and grilled pita or garlic bread.

name: Falafel Plate (750-890 Cals)
description: Crispy vegetarian fritters made from ground chickpeas mixed with herbs & spices. Served with Signature Greek salad, your choice of one side, tzatziki, & grilled pita or garlic bread.

name: Veggie Plate (590-730 Cals)
description: Our Signature Greek salad served with your choice of two sides, tzatziki, & grilled pita or garlic bread.

name: Fried Kalamari Dinner (1510-1650 Cals)
description: Dusted in seasoned flour and lightly fried. Served with MR. GREEK rice, roasted seasonal vegetables and a grilled pita or garlic bread.

name: Grilled Kalamari Dinner (1220-1380 Cals)
description: Tender and grilled over an open flame. Served with freshly sautéed peppers and onions. Generously drizzled with extra virgin olive oil and served with a fresh, juicy, grilled lemon. Served with MR. GREEK rice, roasted seasonal vegetables and a grilled pita or garlic bread.

name: Yiayia's Moussaka (1490 Cals)
description: Prepared fresh daily with layers of baked eggplant, zucchini, potatoes, fresh herbs, lean seasoned ground beef and a creamy béchamel sauce. Served with Signature Greek salad and MR. GREEK Rice.

name: Keftedes Me Saltsa Domata (1040 Cals)
description: Hand-rolled meatballs made with fresh, lean ground beef, red onion & garden fresh herbs, smothered in homemade tomato sauce & served over rice or french fries, topped with grated Kefalograviera cheese.

name: Bifteki Monastiraki (1570-1710 Cals)
description: A well-loved traditional street eat: three signature bifteki hand-crafted from premium ground beef seasoned with exclusive spices; fresh diced tomatoes & red onions drizzled with olive oil & oregano; paired with seasoned fries topped with crumbled feta.

name: Pikilia For Two (1350-2020 Cals /serving; serves 2)
description: Each pikilia comes with two biftekia, two souvlaki sticks (choice of chicken or pork), chicken gyro, traditional (beef & lamb) gyro, a small Greek salad, and your choice of two small sides. Served with tomato & red onion garnish, a large tzatziki and two pitas hot off our grill!

name: Fire-Grilled Chicken Filets (790-930 Cals)
description: Two juicy marinated, fire-grilled chicken filets. Served with MR. GREEK Potatoes, roasted seasonal vegetables and a grilled pita or garlic bread.

name: Homestyle Greek Baklava (440 Cals)
description: Hand-made with fresh phyllo pastry, clarified butter, pure honey, zesty lemon and premium walnuts and almonds. One bite is never enough!

name: Kataifi (440 Cals)
description: A delightful pastry with a nutty centre rolled inside crisp, thread-like pastry (angel hair or kataifi), baked until golden in local Ontario honey with a hint of lemon.

name: Greek Yogurt Cheesecake (390 Cals)
description: Our specially formulated in-house creamy cheesecake prepared with real Greek yogurt set on a walnut, honey graham cracker crumb base; slow-baked and drizzled with local Ontario honey.

name: Bougatsa (330 Cals /serving; serves 2)
description: Warm, golden fluffy phyllo pastry filled with mildly sweetened semolina custard.

name: Kourambiethes
description: Traditional butter almond cookies blanketed with powdered sugar.

name: Kourambiethes Me Sokolata
description: Traditional butter almond cookies covered with chocolate.
